title: [BUG] warning C4668: '_WIN32_WINNT_WIN10_TH2' is not defined as a preprocessor macro, on 14393
body: We just switched to Win10 SDK 10.0.14393.0 and are now getting some new warnings, in .cpp files with #include <Windows.h>

comments.body:
I have been receiving same issue when compiling unreal engine code.
[1/18] applink.c
C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Kits\10\include\10.0.17763.0\ucrt\corecrt.h(212): error C4668: '__cplusplus' is not defined as a preprocessor macro, replacing with '0' for '#if/#elif'

This problem seem to have recurred, except for a different symbol
1>c:\program files (x86)\windows kits\10\include\10.0.17763.0\ucrt\corecrt.h(212): warning C4668: '__cplusplus' is not defined as a preprocessor macro, replacing with '0' for '#if/#elif'
